meanings.definition: Inflammation of the tissue surrounding and supporting the teeth.
meanings.sent1: Periodontitis can cause redness and swelling around the teeth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist diagnosed her with periodontitis after noticing gum inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The party clown joked that his red nose looked like periodontitis around his teeth.
meanings.sent4: The spread of rumors in the small town was like periodontitis, slowly damaging relationships.
meanings.sent5: The wildfire spread through the forest like periodontitis, affecting everything in its path.

meanings.definition: A serious gum infection that damages the soft tissue and destroys the bone that supports your teeth.
meanings.sent1: Severe periodontitis can lead to tooth loss if left untreated.
meanings.sent2: She underwent surgery to treat the advanced stage of periodontitis.
meanings.sent3: The detective jokingly referred to the crime scene as a case of 'whodunit periodontitis'.
meanings.sent4: The economic crisis was like periodontitis, slowly weakening the foundation of businesses.
meanings.sent5: The invasion of pests in the garden was akin to periodontitis, destroying the plants from within.
